42.eng-name: Model Behavior of the Prophet (Kitab Al-Sunnah)

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir ibn Abdullah: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) presented himself to the people at Arafat, saying: Is there any man who takes me to his people? The Quraysh have prevented me from preaching the word of my Lord

chapter.eng-name: The Qur'an, The Word Of Allah
